title: How do I add or remove an email accountï¼Ÿ
answer:
To add another email account:  
Touch Email, press![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111114160235.PNG) , and touch Accounts. Press![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111114160245.PNG) again, and touch Add account.  
To remove an email account:  
Touch Email, press![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111114160259.PNG) , and touch Accounts. Touch and hold the email account to be removed, and touch Remove account.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/1-111114160314.PNG)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/2-111114160322.PNG)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/3-111114160330.PNG)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/4-111114160336.PNG)
